page.title: 05WHERE DO THEY COME FROM ?
page.content: During our{traffic surveys}we took the {registration numbers}of nearly all the vehicles that passed by. From the {letters}on the number plates you can tell where the vehicles were first registered. Here are some parts of the country that those vehicles that passed us came from: Herefordshire, Shropshire, Cornwall, Essex, Glasgow, Somerset, Gloucestershire, Grimsby, Liverpool, Cardiff, London, Leicestershire, Brecon, West Hartlepool, Surrey, Kinross, Cheshire, Lancashire, Yorkshire, Swansea, Stirlingshire, Manchester, Liverpool. From this list you can see what a{busy {road}goes right through our area, people from all over the country {travel}along it either on{business}or for{pleasure.}Would it have been so busy in the middle of{winter}we wonder?
